content:
You can not only redeem your existing points but also earn additional cashback on your customized mug or tea infuser purchase through the cashback app.

Here's how:

**Earn cashback on your purchase:**

1. Make sure the cashback app is active and linked to your credit card or payment method.
2. Shop through the cashback app's portal or use their browser extension to earn cashback on your purchase.
3. If the retailer is a partner with the cashback app, you'll earn a percentage of your purchase back as cashback rewards.

**Stack your rewards:**

1. Even if you don't have enough points to redeem for a discount, you can still earn cashback on your purchase.
2. This way, you'll earn additional rewards points or cashback on top of any discount you might get from redeeming your existing points.

**Example:**

Let's say you want to buy a customized mug from a retailer that offers 5% cashback through the cashback app. You don't have enough points to redeem for a discount, but you can still earn 5% cashback on your purchase. If the mug costs $25, you'll earn $1.25 in cashback rewards.

By earning cashback on your purchase, you'll accumulate more points or rewards that can be redeemed for future discounts or cashouts. It's a great way to maximize your rewards earnings and make the most of your online shopping experience.

Remember to always check the cashback app's terms and conditions, as well as the retailer's cashback rates and any potential exclusions, to ensure you earn the cashback rewards on your customized mug or tea infuser purchase.
